row.SQL: select a.back_code,b.AGENT_CODE, agent_name,product_id,Replace(product_code+PRODUCT_NAME+PRODUCT_SIZE,' ','') product_name,a.back_num,a.BACK_AMOUNT,back_STS,dbo.getDateStr1(back_date) back_date,dbo.getDateStr1(sh_date) sh_date,dbo.getDateStr1(sh_date) Pack_Date from BackDetails a,BackList b,Agent_list c where a.BACK_CODE=b.back_code and b.AGENT_CODE=c.agent_code and BACK_DATE between '@@begin_date,' and '@@end_date,' and note_type='XS' and b.agent_code='@@agent_code,'

select ORDER_CODE,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,sex,Arr_Address,arr_address_detail,isnull(xfjb,'')+isnull(zxjd,'')+isnull(groom_memo,'') order_memo,isnull(housetype,'') housetype,order_src,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where ORDERCODE=a.order_code and track_memo='客户进店') track_num,yqazsj,order_amount,dbo.getdatestr1(order_date) order_date,isnull((select sum(convert(decimal(12,2),col_amount)) from ordercol where ordercode=a.order_code),0) total_colamount,isnull(cl_tel,'0') cl_tel,isnull(opr_dw,'') opr_dw,(select isnull(SUM(bound),0) from orderbound where Order_Code=a.order_code) bound,order_sts,level,isrepair,isnull(srv_tel,'') srv_tel,isnull(srv_man,'') srv_man,dbo.getJLAZDate(yqazsj,order_sts,az_date) jl_day,isnull((select COUNT(*) from orderreport where ordercode=a.order_code),0) tscs,isattent,arr_address_city,lon,lat,FPH,housearea,djje,isnull(dbo.getOrderXGTImage(a.order_code,'效果图' ) ,'images/xgt/'+dbo.gethousetype(housetype)+'.jpg|') short_image_path,case dh_sts when '改单中' then '未处理' else dh_sts end dh_sts,dbo.getDhStsNum(dh_sts) dh_sts_num,Cust_Name agent_name,(select prov from agent_list where AGENT_CODE=a.AGENT_CODE) prov,jdcs ,opr_man,opr_tel,opr_date,opr_headimage,ywy,ywy_tel,groom_date,ywy_headimage,dgy,dgy_tel,dgy_date,dgy_headimage,sjs,sjs_tel,sjs_date,sjs_headimage,shy,shy_tel,shy_date,shy_headimage,az_man,az_tel,az_date,az_headimage,dbo.getdatestr1(dateadd(yy,1,az_date)) bxq,agent_code,isnull(cl_man,'') cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,case (select top 1 isstock from agent_list where agent_code=a.agent_code) when '否' then 1 else isnull(printhits,0) end printhits,(select count(*) from WeiXinAppUser where lxfs=a.arr_tel) isMember,isnull(xfjb,'') xfjb,isnull(zxjd,'') zxjd,isnull(groom_memo,'') groom_memo,ISNULL(dbo.getdatestr1(tzshrq),'') tzshrq,isnull((select top 1 srv_sts from ordersrv where order_code=a.order_code),'0') srv_sts from OrderList a where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,'

select (select COUNT(*) from orderlist where ORDER_STS='9' and will_flag='0' and AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,') will_num,(select COUNT(*) from orderlist where ORDER_STS!='9' and trans_flag='0' and AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,') trans_num,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack a,OrderList b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and isRead='0' and AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,') track_num,(select COUNT(*) from MsgList where MsgTel='@@agent_tel,' and isread='0') msg_num ,(select '今天成交' +CONVERT(varchar,ordernum) +'单,收集客户'+convert(varchar,custnum)+'个，给他店带单'+convert(varchar,sharenum)+'单。' from (select COUNT(*) ordernum from OrderList where dbo.getDateStr1(order_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(GETDATE()) and AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,') x,(select COUNT(*) custnum from OrderList where dbo.getDateStr1(groom_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(GETDATE()) and AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,') y,(select COUNT(*) sharenum from OrderList where dbo.getDateStr1(order_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(GETDATE()) and opr_tel in (select lxfs from TJ_SYS_YH where dept='@@agent_code,') ) z) will_tip,(select COUNT(*) from tj_sys_yh where DEPT='@@agent_code,' and yhjb='外协' and ISNULL(SFZ,'')='') newempNum,(select COUNT(*) from MsgList where MsgTel='@@agent_tel,' and isread='0' and msgtype!='消息') work_num,(select COUNT(*) from orderlist where ORDER_STS='3' and AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,') daz_num

select Order_Code,dbo.getDatestr3(isnull(zjlxsj,groom_Date)) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address+case order_sts when 0 then '('+ismeter+')' when '9' then '('+ismeter+')' else '' end arr_address,case order_sts when '9' then '未成交' when '0' then '已成交' when '1' then '测量中' when '2' then '待设计' when '3' then '待安装' when '5' then '已安装' end ordersts_memo,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where isRead='0' and OrderCode=a.order_code) track_num,opr_dw,(select top 1 wx_headimage from tj_sys_yh where lxfs=isnull(a.ywy_tel,a.opr_tel)) wx_headimage,isnull(ismeter,'') ismeter,opr_tel,mytrans_flag,AZ_DATE,case ORDER_STS when '9' then 25-datediff(dd,groom_date,getdate()) else 0 end day_hs,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount,cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,az_sjdate,tjcs,dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date from orderList a where agent_code='@@agent_code,' and ywy_tel!='' and ywy_tel is not null

select (select COUNT(*) from orderlist where mytrans_flag='0' and (ywy_tel='@@agent_tel,') ) trans_num,(select COUNT(*) from orderlist where order_sts='3' and az_tel='@@agent_tel,') az_num,(select COUNT(*) from OrderBound where isread='0' and Rev_Tel='@@agent_tel,') bound_num,(select COUNT(*) from MsgList where MsgTel='@@agent_tel,' and isread='0') msg_num ,(select tip from (select top 1 opr_man+'给你打赏了'+CONVERT(varchar(10),bound)+'元' tip from OrderBound where bound_Date>0 and isread='0' and rev_tel='@@agent_tel,' order by bound_id desc) x) will_tip,(select count(*) from orderList a,tj_sys_yh b where a.ywy_tel=b.lxfs and (ywy_tel='@@agent_tel,') and dbo.getdatestr1(yjlxsj)= dbo.getdatestr1(getdate())) today_num
select dbo.getDateStr1(az_date) az_date,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,ORDER_CODE from OrderList where ORDER_STS='3' and AZ_TEL='@@agent_tel,'
select count(*) isJoin from TJ_SYS_YH where LXFS='@@lxfs,'
row.KJSM: 判断客串串是否已经加盟

row.SQL: select yhh,yhxm,dept,isnull(dzjc,'')+isnull(bz,' ') dzjc,yhjb,dz,lxfs,bm,isnull(wx_headimage,'') wx_headimage from tj_sys_yh where DEPT='@@agent_code,' and yhjb='外协' and sts='0'

select yhh,yhxm,dept,isnull(dzjc,'')+isnull(bz,' ') dzjc,yhjb,dz,lxfs,bm,isnull(bz,'') bz,isnull(wx_headimage,'') wx_headimage,wx_nick,wx_openid from tj_sys_yh where DEPT='@@agent_code,' and yhjb='外协' and ISNULL(SFZ,'')=''
select isnull(SUM(bound),0) bound from OrderBound where Rev_Tel='@@agent_tel,'

select dbo.getdatestr3(groom_date) groom_date,Arr_Man,Arr_Address,Arr_Tel,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where ORDERCODE=a.order_code) track_num,Order_Amount,(select SUM(bound) from OrderBound where ORDER_CODE=a.ORDER_CODE) bound,cust_name,case order_sts when '9' then '未成交' else '已成交' end order_sts,order_memo from orderlist a where Opr_Tel='@@agent_tel,'

select (select COUNT(*) from orderlist where ORDER_STS='9' and Opr_Tel='@@agent_tel,') wcj,(select COUNT(*) from OrderList where ORDER_STS!='9' and Opr_Tel='@@agent_tel,') ycj,(select COUNT(*) from OrderList where ORDER_STS not in ('0','9') and Opr_Tel='@@agent_tel,') ydg

select ordercode,image_name,image_path,image_shortpath,image_memo,image_length,image_width,'salsa/order_photo/small/'+right(image_path,36) min_path from orderimage where ordercode='@@ordercode,' and image_type='定稿图'
select yhh,yhxm,dept,isnull(dzjc,'')+isnull(bz,'') dzjc,yhjb,dz,lxfs,bm,wx_headimage,wx_nick from tj_sys_yh where DEPT='@@agent_code,' and YHJB in ('安装工','售后主管') and sts='0'

select yhh,yhxm,dept,isnull(dzjc,'')+isnull(bz,'') dzjc,yhjb,dz,lxfs,bm,wx_headimage,wx_nick,(select COUNT(*) from OrderSrv where srv_mantel=a.lxfs and srv_sjdate is null and srv_yjdate='@@yjcl_date,') total_clnum from tj_sys_yh a where DEPT in ('@@agent_code,') and sts='0'
select dbo.getDateStr1(cl_date) az_date,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,ORDER_CODE from OrderList where isMeter='测量中' and cl_TEL='@@agent_tel,'

select yhh,yhxm,dept,isnull(dzjc,'')+isnull(bz,'') dzjc,yhjb,dz,lxfs,bm,wx_headimage,wx_nick,stuff(lxfs,4,4,'****') y_sj,stuff(yhxm,2,1,'*') y_yhxm from tj_sys_yh where DEPT in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') and sts='0'

select Order_Code,dbo.getDatestr3(groom_Date) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,order_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address,case order_sts when '9' then '未成交' when '0' then '已成交' when '1' then '测量中' when '2' then '待设计' when '3' then '待安装' when '6' then '已通知安装' when '5' then '已安装' end ordersts_memo,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where isRead='0' and OrderCode=a.order_code) track_num,mytrans_flag,(select wx_headimage from tj_sys_yh where lxfs=isnull(a.ywy_tel,a.opr_tel)) wx_headimage from orderList a where order_sts in('3','5') and agent_code='@@agent_code,'
select dbo.getDateStr1(cl_date) az_date,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,ORDER_CODE from OrderList where isMeter='已测量' and cl_TEL='@@agent_tel,'
select dbo.getDateStr1(az_date) az_date,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,ORDER_CODE from OrderList where ORDER_STS='5' and az_TEL='@@agent_tel,'

select ordercode,image_name,image_path,image_shortpath,image_memo,image_length,image_width,'salsa/order_photo/small/'+right(image_path,36) min_path from orderimage where ordercode='@@ordercode,' and image_type='测量图'

select order_amount,isnull((select sum(convert(decimal(12,2),col_amount)) from ordercol where ordercode=a.order_code),0) total_colamount,isnull((select sum(convert(decimal(12,2),bound)) from orderbound where order_code=a.order_code),0) total_bound,wx_headimage,wx_nick,yhxm opr_man,wx_openid from OrderList a,tj_sys_yh b where a.opr_tel=b.lxfs and ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,'
select isnull(agent_amount,0) agent_amount,isnull(wx_ewm,'') wx_ewm,isnull(zfb_ewm,'') zfb_ewm,ISNULL(Lat,0) lat,ISNULL(Lon,0) lon from agent_list where agent_code='@@agent_code,'

row.CS: order by zjlxsj desc, id desc
row.SQL: select Order_Code,dbo.getDatestr3(isnull(zjlxsj,groom_Date)) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,order_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address,case order_sts when '9' then '未成交' when '0' then '已成交' when '1' then '测量中' when '2' then '待设计' when '3' then '待安装' when '6' then '待送货' when '5' then '已安装' end ordersts_memo,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where isRead='0' and OrderCode=a.order_code) track_num,mytrans_flag,wx_headimage from orderList a,tj_sys_yh b where a.ywy_tel=b.lxfs and (ywy_tel='@@agent_tel,') and dbo.getdatestr1(yjlxsj)= dbo.getdatestr1(getdate())

select agent_name,agent_code,(select top 1 brand_image from brand_list where brand_name=a.brand_code) agent_headimage,(select count(*) from orderlist where AGENT_CODE=a.agent_code and Arr_Tel='@@agent_tel,') isshare from Agent_list a where LMBM in (select top 1 lmbm from Agent_list where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,') and AGENT_CODE != '@@agent_code,'
select top 1 Opr_Tel,yhXM,DZJC,WX_headimage from orderlist a,TJ_SYS_YH b where a.opr_tel=b.lxfs and order_code='@@order_code,'
select ID product_code,product_num from product_list where product_name='@@product_name,' and PRODUCT_COLOR='@@product_color,' and gas_type='@@gas_type,' and gas_style='@@gas_style,'
select ID product_code,product_num,product_name,product_color,gas_type,gas_style,product_image,product_price from product_list where product_name='@@product_name,'
select brand_image,agentname,agent_code,ordernum,sharenum from dbo.v_lmsj('@@order_date1,','@@order_date2,','@@agent_code,')
select sum(isnull(ordernum,0)) total_ordernum,sum(isnull(sharenum,0)) total_sharenum from dbo.v_lmsj('@@order_date1,','@@order_date2,','@@agent_code,')
select Charge_Memo,charge_amount,dbo.getdatetime(charge_date) charge_date,charge_id,chargecode,rev_tel,rev_man from OrderCharge where Agent_Code='@@agent_code,'

select yhxm,wx_headimage,(select COUNT(*) from OrderList where YWY_TEL=x.lxfs and Order_DATE between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59') orderNum,(select isnull(sum(col_amount),0) from ordercol a,OrderList b where a.OrderCode=b.ORDER_CODE and YWY_TEL=x.lxfs and col_DATE between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59') orderAmount,(select COUNT(*) from OrderList where YWY_TEL=x.lxfs and groom_date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59') groomNum,(select count(distinct ordercode) from OrderTrack where Track_Date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59' and Track_Tel=x.lxfs) tracknum from TJ_SYS_YH x where DEPT='@@agent_code,' and YHJB in ('导购','店长','老板','售后主管','超级老板')
select YHXM,LXFS,WX_headimage,wx_nick,longitude,latitude,position from TJ_SYS_YH where DEPT='@@agent_code,' and yhjb !='外协'

select yhxm,wx_headimage,(select COUNT(*) from OrderList where YWY_TEL=x.lxfs and Order_DATE between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59') orderNum,(select isnull(sum(col_amount),0) from ordercol a,OrderList b where a.OrderCode=b.ORDER_CODE and YWY_TEL=x.lxfs and col_DATE between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59') orderAmount,(select COUNT(*) from OrderList where YWY_TEL=x.lxfs and groom_date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59') groomNum,(select count(distinct ordercode) from OrderTrack where Track_Date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59' and Track_Tel=x.lxfs) tracknum,(select agent_name from Agent_list where AGENT_CODE=x.dept) agent_name,lxfs,position from TJ_SYS_YH x where lxfs='@@agent_tel,'
row.KJSM: 点击员工地图后看到的数据

row.SQL: select dbo.getDateStr3(track_date) track_date,track_man,track_tel,track_content,agree_num,dbo.getTrackImage(track_id) image_paths,dbo.getTrackMaxImage(track_id) max_imagepaths,wx_headimage,track_address from worktrack a,tj_sys_yh b where a.track_tel=b.lxfs and a.track_tel='@@agent_tel,' and track_type='工作日志'

select track_date track_date1,dbo.getDateStr3(track_date) track_date,track_man,track_tel,track_content,agree_num,dbo.getTrackImage(track_id) image_paths,dbo.getTrackMaxImage(track_id) max_imagepaths,wx_headimage,track_address,dbo.getWorkTrackAgree(track_id) track_agree,dbo.getWorkTrackComment(track_id) track_comment,track_id from worktrack a,tj_sys_yh b where a.track_tel=b.lxfs and a.agentcode='@@agent_code,' and track_type='工作日志' and track_sjid is null
row.KJSM: 老板查看工作日志列表

row.SQL: select isnull(sum(ordernum),0) order_num,isnull(sum(orderAmount),0) orderamount from ( select yhxm,wx_headimage,(select COUNT(*) from OrderList where YWY_TEL=x.lxfs and Order_DATE between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59') orderNum,(select isnull(sum(col_amount),0) from ordercol a,OrderList b where a.OrderCode=b.ORDER_CODE and YWY_TEL=x.lxfs and col_DATE between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59') orderAmount,(select COUNT(*) from OrderList where YWY_TEL=x.lxfs and groom_date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59') groomNum,(select count(distinct ordercode) from OrderTrack where Track_Date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:59' and Track_Tel=x.lxfs) tracknum,lxfs from TJ_SYS_YH x where DEPT='@@agent_code,' and YHJB in ('导购','店长','老板','售后主管','超级老板') ) x where 1=1

select COUNT(*) cs_num,dbo.getDateStr3(GETDATE()) qd_time,datename(yyyy,GETDATE())+'年'+dbo.lpad('0',2,datename(mm,getdate()))+'月'+dbo.lpad('0',2,datename(dd,GETDATE()))+'日' qd_date from WorkTrack where Track_Type='签到' and Track_Tel='@@agent_tel,' and dbo.getDateStr1(track_date)=dbo.getDateStr1(getdate())

select Track_Man,dbo.getDateStr3(track_date) qd_time,WX_headimage,Track_Address,lon,lat,Track_Content,(select COUNT(*) from WorkTrack where dbo.getDateStr1(track_date)=dbo.getDateStr1(a.track_date) and Track_Tel=a.Track_Tel) cs_num,dbo.getTrackImage(track_id) image_paths,dbo.getTrackMaxImage(track_id) max_imagepaths from WorkTrack a,TJ_SYS_YH b where a.track_tel=b.lxfs and agentcode='@@agent_code,' and dbo.getdatestr1(Track_Date)=dbo.getdatestr1('@@qd_date,') and track_type='签到'

select SUM(wqd) wqds,SUM(yqd) qds from (select case when track_tel is null then 1 else 0 end wqd,case when track_tel is not null then 1 else 0 end yqd from (select * from (select Track_Tel,agentcode,COUNT(*) qdcs from WorkTrack where agentcode='@@agent_code,' and Track_Type in ('签到','上班打卡','下班打卡') and dbo.getdatestr1(Track_Date)=dbo.getdatestr1('@@qd_date,')group by Track_Tel,agentcode) x1,tj_sys_yh y1 where x1.agentcode=dept and Track_Tel=*lxfs and DEPT='@@agent_code,' ) x ) y

select WX_headimage,yhxm from (select * from (select Track_Tel,agentcode,COUNT(*) qdcs from WorkTrack where agentcode='@@agent_code,' and Track_Type in ('上班打卡','下班打卡') and dbo.getdatestr1(Track_Date)=dbo.getdatestr1('@@qd_date,')group by Track_Tel,agentcode) x1,tj_sys_yh y1 where x1.agentcode=dept and Track_Tel=*lxfs and DEPT='@@agent_code,' ) x where Track_Tel is null

select SUM(wqd) wqds,SUM(yqd) yqds from (select case when track_date is null then 1 else 0 end wqd,case when track_date is not null then 1 else 0 end yqd from (select * from (select Track_Tel,dbo.getDateStr1(track_date) track_date,COUNT(*) qdcs from WorkTrack where Track_Tel='@@agent_tel,' and Track_Type='签到' group by Track_Tel,dbo.getDateStr1(track_date)) x1,dbo.v_monthofdays('@@d_month,') y1 where x1.track_date=*monthofdays) x ) y

select datename(mm,track_date) m,dbo.lpad('0',2,DATENAME(dd,track_date)) d,dbo.getTime(track_date) t,Track_Content,Track_Address,dbo.getTrackImage(track_id) image_paths,dbo.getTrackMaxImage(track_id) max_imagepaths,lon,lat from WorkTrack a where datename(yyyy,track_date)+'-'+datename(mm,track_date) ='@@d_month,' and Track_Tel='@@agent_tel,' and Track_Type='签到'

select dbo.lpad('0',2,DATENAME(dd,monthofdays)) d from (select * from (select Track_Tel,dbo.getDateStr1(track_date) track_date,COUNT(*) qdcs from WorkTrack where Track_Tel='@@agent_tel,' and Track_Type='签到' group by Track_Tel,dbo.getDateStr1(track_date)) x1,dbo.v_monthofdays('@@d_month,') y1 where x1.track_date=*monthofdays) x where Track_Date is null

row.LJH: select count(*) qk_bs,sum(order_amount-col_amount) qk_amount from (select ORDER_CODE,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,ywy,az_date,max(Order_Amount) order_amount,isnull(sum(Col_Amount),0) col_amount,ywy_tel,dh_sts from OrderList a,ordercol b where a.ORDER_CODE=b.OrderCode and col_sts='已入账' and order_amount>0 and AGENT_CODE in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') group by ORDER_CODE,az_date,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail,ywy,ywy_tel,dh_sts ) x where (order_amount-col_amount)>0 and dh_sts in ('未处理','已送货','已安装')
row.SQL: select ORDER_CODE,cust_name,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,arr_address,YWY,AZ_DATE,order_amount,col_amount,(order_amount-col_amount) qk_amount from (select ORDER_CODE,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,ywy,az_date,max(Order_Amount) order_amount,isnull(sum(Col_Amount),0) col_amount,ywy_tel,dh_sts from OrderList a,ordercol b where a.ORDER_CODE=b.OrderCode and col_sts='已入账' and order_amount>0 and AGENT_CODE in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') group by ORDER_CODE,az_date,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail,ywy,ywy_tel,dh_sts ) x where (order_amount-col_amount)>0 and dh_sts in ('未处理','已送货','已安装')

select sum(order_amount-isnull(total_colamount,0)) qk_amount from (select dbo.getdatestr1(order_date) order_date,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,ORDER_CODE,Order_Amount, (select sum(col_amount) from ordercol where OrderCode=a.order_code) total_colamount,ywy_tel from OrderList a where order_amount>0 and AGENT_CODE in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')) x where (order_amount-isnull(total_colamount,0))>0
select '@@content,' nr, device_token token1,lxfs msgTel,'' sendTel,'艾管理' appnamem,'' ordercode,'提醒' msgtype,yhjb from TJ_SYS_YH where DEPT ='@@agent_code,'

select monthofdays,datename(weekday,monthofdays) wk_day from dbo.v_monthofdays('@@yearmonth,') a

row.SQL: select Order_Code,dbo.getDateTime(zjlxsj) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,case order_sts when 0 then '('+ismeter+')' when '9' then '('+ismeter+')' else '' end ismeter,case order_sts when '9' then '未成交' when '0' then '已成交' when '1' then '测量中' when '2' then '待设计' when '3' then '待安装' when '5' then '已安装' end ordersts_memo,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where isRead='0' and OrderCode=a.order_code) track_num,opr_dw,(select top 1 wx_headimage from tj_sys_yh where lxfs=isnull(a.ywy_tel,a.opr_tel)) wx_headimage,isnull(ismeter,'') ismeter,opr_tel,mytrans_flag,AZ_DATE,case ORDER_STS when '9' then 25-datediff(dd,groom_date,getdate()) else 0 end day_hs,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount,cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,az_sjdate,tjcs,dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getJLAZDate(yqazsj,ORDER_STS,az_date) jl_day ,djje,dh_sts,fph,sex,isattent from orderList a where agent_code='@@agent_code,' and ywy_tel!='' and order_sts!='9'

row.SQL: select case isnull(ywy_tel,'') when '' then '该客户已存在，且在弃单池中。' else case order_sts when '9' then '该客户已存在，且在订单跟进列表中。' else '该客户已存在，且在已成交列表中。' end end existsreason,arr_address,arr_address_detail,order_code from OrderList where Arr_Tel='@@arr_tel,' and agent_code='@@agent_code,'

row.KJSM: 判断订单是否已经报单

row.SQL: select wcs_num,jcwc_num,cewc_num,M@@month, byyj,H@@month, byrw,case wcl when '0' then '任务未下达' else convert(varchar,WCL) end wcl, case when wcl<50 then '1,只有努力才能靠近目标！空想，没有用！' when wcl>50 and wcl<80 then '2,赚钱是一种能力，但须使出洪荒之力！' when wcl>80 and wcl<100 then '2,目标就在不远处，世界将会为你让路！' when wcl>100 and wcl<130 then '3,一切皆有可能，相信你还可以更能！！' when wcl>130 and wcl<160 then '3,你的能量超乎你想象，我知道你还有能量！' when wcl>160 then '3,超越梦想一起飞，让生命回味这一刻，让岁月铭记这一回！' end hs from ( select sum(wcs_num) wcs_num,sum(jbwc_num) jcwc_num,sum(cewc_num) cewc_num,SUM(M@@month,) M@@month,,SUM(H@@month,) H@@month,,case SUM(H@@month,) when 0 then 0 else CONVERT(decimal(18,2),SUM(M@@month,)/sum(H@@month,))*100 end WCL from ( select a.agent_code,case when Z@@month,<80 then 1 else 0 end wcs_num, case when Z@@month,>=80 and Z@@month,<100 then 1 else 0 end jbwc_num, case when Z@@month,>=100 then 1 else 0 end cewc_num,M@@month,,H@@month, from dbo.v_xsrwb_hk('@@year,') a where (a.agent_code='@@xm,' or a.agent_code in (select yhxm from tj_sys_yh where sjyhh='@@xm,') or a.agent_code in (select yhxm from tj_sys_yh where sjyhh in (select yhxm from tj_sys_yh where sjyhh='@@xm,'))) ) x ) y
row.KJSM: 区域经理任务完成率提醒

row.SQL: select y.agent_code,agent_amount,wcs_num,jcwc_num,cewc_num,M@@month, byyj,H@@month, byrw,case when wcl is null then '任务未下达' else convert(varchar,wcl) end wcl,isnull(wcje,0) wcje,isnull(xsrw,0) xsrw, case when wcl<50.00 then '1,只有努力才能靠近目标！空想，没有用！' when wcl>50.00 and wcl<80.00 then '2,赚钱是一种能力，但须使出洪荒之力！' when wcl>80.00 and wcl<100.00 then '2,目标就在不远处，世界将会为你让路！' when wcl>100.00 and wcl<130.00 then '3,一切皆有可能，相信你还可以更能！！' when wcl>130.00 and wcl<160.00 then '3,你的能量超乎你想象，我知道你还有能量！' when wcl>160.00 then '3,超越梦想一起飞，让生命回味这一刻，让岁月铭记这一回！' end hs,convert(varchar,ROW_NUMBER) rownum,CONVERT(varchar,totalnum) totalnum from ( select agent_code,agent_amount,sum(wcs_num) wcs_num,sum(jbwc_num) jcwc_num,sum(cewc_num) cewc_num,SUM(M@@month,) M@@month,,SUM(H@@month,) H@@month,,case SUM(H@@month,) when 0 then null else CONVERT(decimal(18,2),SUM(M@@month,)/sum(H@@month,))*100 end WCL,ROW_NUMBER,totalnum,wcje,xsrw from ( select b.agent_code,agent_amount,case when Z@@month,<80 then 1 else 0 end wcs_num, case when Z@@month,>=80 and Z@@month,<100 then 1 else 0 end jbwc_num, case when Z@@month,>=100 then 1 else 0 end cewc_num,isnull(M@@month,,0) M@@month,,H@@month,,row_number,totalnum,wcje,xsrw from dbo.v_xsrwb1('@@year,') a,Agent_list b where a.agent_code=*b.AGENT_CODE and b.agent_code='@@agent_code,' ) x group by agent_code,agent_amount,row_number,totalnum,wcje,xsrw ) y
row.KJSM: 经销商任务完成率提醒

row.SQL: select agent_code,agent_name,contact_man,agent_tel,sts,byyj,byrw, wcl,open_flag,wcje,xsrw,rownum,totalnum from (select agent_code,agent_name,contact_man,agent_tel,open_flag,case wcs_num when 1 then '未完成' else '' end+ case jbwc_num when 1 then '初步完成' else '' end+ case cewc_num when 1 then '超额完成'else '' end sts, M@@month, byyj,H@@month, byrw,case H@@month, when 0 then '任务未下达' else convert(varchar,CONVERT(decimal(18,2),M@@month,/H@@month,)*100) end WCL, wcje,xsrw,rownum,totalnum from ( select a.agent_code,agent_name,contact_man,agent_tel,open_flag,case when Z@@month,<80 then 1 else 0 end wcs_num,case when Z@@month,>=80 and Z@@month,<100 then 1 else 0 end jbwc_num,case when Z@@month,>=100 then 1 else 0 end cewc_num,M@@month,,H@@month,,wcje,xsrw,ROW_NUMBER rownum,totalnum from dbo.v_xsrwb1('@@year,') a,Agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.AGENT_CODE and (domain_man='@@xm,' or domain_man in (select yhxm from tj_sys_yh where sjyhh='@@xm,') or domain_man in (select yhxm from tj_sys_yh where sjyhh in (select yhxm from tj_sys_yh where sjyhh='@@xm,'))) ) x ) y where 1=1

select wcs_num,jcwc_num,cewc_num,M@@month, byyj,H@@month, byrw,wcl, case when wcl<50 then '1,只有努力才能靠近目标！空想，没有用！' when wcl>50 and wcl<80 then '2,赚钱是一种能力，但须使出洪荒之力！' when wcl>80 and wcl<100 then '2,目标就在不远处，世界将会为你让路！' when wcl>100 and wcl<130 then '3,一切皆有可能，相信你还可以更能！！' when wcl>130 and wcl<160 then '3,你的能量超乎你想象，我知道你还有能量！' when wcl>160 then '3,超越梦想一起飞，让生命回味这一刻，让岁月铭记这一回！' end hs from ( select sum(wcs_num) wcs_num,sum(jbwc_num) jcwc_num,sum(cewc_num) cewc_num,SUM(M@@month,) M@@month,,SUM(H@@month,) H@@month,,case SUM(H@@month,) when 0 then '任务未下达' else CONVERT(decimal(18,2),SUM(M@@month,)/sum(H@@month,))*100 end WCL from ( select a.agent_code,case when Z@@month,<80 then 1 else 0 end wcs_num, case when Z@@month,>=80 and Z@@month,<100 then 1 else 0 end jbwc_num, case when Z@@month,>=100 then 1 else 0 end cewc_num,M@@month,,H@@month, from dbo.v_xsrwb_hk('@@year,') a where 1=1 ) x ) y where 1=1

row.CS: ) x ) y where 1=1 order by rownum asc
row.SQL: select agent_code,agent_name,contact_man,agent_tel,sts,byyj,byrw, wcl,open_flag,wcje,xsrw,rownum,totalnum from (select agent_code,agent_name,contact_man,agent_tel,open_flag,case wcs_num when 1 then '未完成' else '' end+ case jbwc_num when 1 then '初步完成' else '' end+ case cewc_num when 1 then '超额完成'else '' end sts, M@@month, byyj,H@@month, byrw,case H@@month, when 0 then '任务未下达' else convert(varchar,CONVERT(decimal(18,2),M@@month,/H@@month,)*100) end WCL, wcje,xsrw,rownum,totalnum from ( select a.agent_code,agent_name,contact_man,agent_tel,open_flag,case when Z@@month,<80 then 1 else 0 end wcs_num,case when Z@@month,>=80 and Z@@month,<100 then 1 else 0 end jbwc_num,case when Z@@month,>=100 then 1 else 0 end cewc_num,M@@month,,H@@month,,wcje,xsrw,ROW_NUMBER rownum,totalnum from dbo.v_xsrwb1('@@year,') a,Agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.AGENT_CODE
select agent_code,agent_name from agent_list where SJBM='-1'
select lxfs,yhxm,wx_headimage from tj_sys_yh where YHZ='区域经理' and sts='0'

select dbo.getdatestr1(pack_date) pack_date,dbo.getdatetime(sh_date) sh_date,rtrim(a.back_code) back_code,dbo.getAgentName(b.agent_code) agent_name,dbo.getSeriesName(a.series_code) series_name,a.product_code,a.product_name+isnull(a.product_size,'') product_name,a.product_untl,dbo.clearzero(a.fact_num) fact_num,dbo.clearzero(a.Reved_Num) reved_num,dbo.clearzero(a.fact_num-a.Reved_Num) qhs,ywy,agent_code,product_image,a.id,isnull(ticket_num,0) ticket_num from backdetails a,backlist b where a.BACK_CODE=b.BACK_CODE and issend='欠货' and AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,'

select dbo.getdatetime(back_date) rq,back_code,agent_name,ywy,back_demo,back_amount,a.agent_code,agent_amount,dbo.getSts(back_sts) back_sts,b.brand_code,arr_address bank_name,dbo.getDateTime(a.end_date) end_date,isnull((select bank_image from bm_bank where bank_name=arr_address),'') bank_image from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and Note_Type='SK' and back_sts!='2' and a.back_date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:00'

select dbo.getdatetime(back_date) rq,back_code,agent_name,ywy,back_demo,back_amount,a.agent_code,agent_amount,dbo.getSts(back_sts) back_sts,b.brand_code,arr_address bank_name,dbo.getDateTime(a.end_date) end_date,isnull((select bank_image from bm_bank where bank_name=arr_address),'') bank_image from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and Note_Type='SK' and back_sts='2' and a.end_date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:00'

select wqr_num,wqr_amount,yqr_num,yqr_amount from (select count(*) wqr_num,isnull(sum(back_amount),0) wqr_amount from backlist a where Note_Type='SK' and back_sts!='2' and back_date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:00') x ,(select count(*) yqr_num,sum(back_amount) yqr_amount from backlist a where Note_Type='SK' and back_sts='2' and end_date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:00' ) y

row.LJH: select count(distinct agent_code) total_num,sum(amount) total_amount,sum(hk_amount) total_hk_amount from dbo.v_xshzb_account('@@order_date1, 00:00:00','@@order_date2, 23:59:59') where 1=1
row.CS: group by agent_code,agent_name,agent_tel,open_flag) x where 1=1 order by @@sort,
row.SQL: select agent_code,agent_tel,agent_name,amount,open_flag,hk_amount from (select agent_code,agent_name,agent_tel,open_flag,SUM(amount) amount,SUM(hk_amount) hk_amount from dbo.v_xshzb_account('@@order_date1, 00:00:00','@@order_date2, 23:59:59') where 1=1
select COUNT(*) js,sum(amount) amount from ( select agent_code,agent_name,agent_tel,SUM(amount) amount from dbo.v_xshzb_account('@@order_date1, 00:00:00','@@order_date2, 23:59:59') where 1=1

select count(*) num,sum(back_amount) back_amount from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and Note_Type='SK' and back_sts='2' and a.end_date between '@@order_date1, 00:00:00' and '@@order_date2, 23:59:00'

select dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date,ORDER_CODE,a.AGENT_CODE,Cust_Name,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,Arr_Man,Order_Amount,az_date,order_memo,fph,dh_sts,ywy,sex,isnull((select sum(product_num) from orderproduct where order_code=a.order_code),0) zsl,isnull((select sum(product_amount) from orderproduct where order_code=a.order_code),0) zje,a.adh_agentcode,agent_name from orderlist a,agent_list b where a.adh_agentcode=b.agent_code
select count(*) num, sum(order_amount) order_amount from orderlist a,agent_list b where a.adh_agentcode=b.agent_code
select bm,mc from bm_jylm

select ORDER_CODE,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,dbo.getDateTime(td_date) td_date,Cust_Name,dbo.getDateTime(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getDateTime(order_date) order_date,order_sts,order_amount,isnull((select SUM(charge_amount) from OrderCharge where ChargeCode=a.order_code and Charge_Memo in ('感谢费','成交金')),0) charge_amount from v_orderlist a where opr_tel='@@opr_tel,'
select count(*) issend from orderlistpublic where arr_tel='@@arr_tel,'

select report_id,ordercode,report_content,dbo.getdatetime(report_date) report_date,report_man,reply_content,reply_man,dbo.getdatetime(reply_date) reply_date,memo from orderreport a,orderlist b where a.ordercode=b.ORDER_CODE and Opr_Tel='@@opr_tel,'
select arr_man,sex,arr_tel,arr_address,order_code,groom_memo from v_orderlist where order_code='@@order_code,'
select metail_id,metail_name from ordermetail where ordercode='@@order_code,'
select Image_Id,image_path,'salsa/order_photo/small/'+right(image_path,36) image_shortpath from OrderImage where ordercode='@@order_code,' and Image_Type='分享图'

select report_id,ordercode,report_content,dbo.getdatetime(report_date) report_date,report_man,reply_content,reply_man,dbo.getdatetime(reply_date) reply_date,memo from orderreport a,orderlist b where a.ordercode=b.ORDER_CODE and a.ordercode='@@order_code,'

select arr_man,sex,arr_tel,arr_address,groom_memo,dbo.getOrderMetail(a.order_code) metails,[dbo].[getOrderImage](a.order_code,'分享图') images_path,opr_man,opr_dw,opr_token,dbo.getDateTime(groom_date) groom_date,opr_tel,a.order_code from orderlistpublic a where ORDER_STS='未抢' and secret_level='@@secret_level,' and order_code in (select ordercode from ordersecret where agent_lmid_code='@@agent_code,')
select isnull(yh_amount,0) yh_amount from weixinappuser_open a where lxfs='@@lxfs,'
select count(*) isqd from orderlist a where order_code='@@order_code,'
select wx_headimage,wx_nick,yhxm opr_man,wx_openid,yh_amount from weixinappuser_open b where lxfs='@@lxfs,'
select Charge_Memo,charge_amount,dbo.getdatetime(charge_date) charge_date,charge_id,chargecode,send_tel,send_man from v_orderbound where account='@@lxfs,'

select (select COUNT(*) from orderlistpublic where opr_tel='@@opr_tel,' and order_sts='未抢') wqds,(select COUNT(*) from orderreport a,orderlist b where a.ordercode=b.ORDER_CODE and Opr_Tel='@@opr_tel,') tscs
select hs_content from bm_hs
select cjds,cjje,sjkhs,tp,tp_hs from [dbo].[v_tdtsb]('@@lxfs,')
select azs,cls,wxs,tp,tp_hs from [dbo].[v_aztsb]('@@lxfs,')
row.KJSM: 安装工售后主管界面提醒表

row.SQL: select count(*) qds from orderlistpublic a,agent_list b where ORDER_STS='未抢' and b.agent_code='@@agent_code,' and dbo.fnGetDistance(a.lat,a.lon,ISNULL(b.lat,0),ISNULL(b.lon,0))<150
select (isnull(yh_amount,0)-case '@@gxf,' when '' then 0 else '@@gxf,' end) qks from WeiXinAppUser_Open where lxfs='@@lxfs,'

select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) back_date,back_code,dbo.getAgentName(a.agent_code) agent_name,ywy,back_demo,back_amount,a.agent_code,sfsf,dbo.getBTFHGZ(qt_amount) bttfgz,isnull((select SUM(bt_amount) from bt_list where bt_CODE=a.back_code),0) ysy_amount,dbo.getdatestr1(arr_date) arr_date from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and note_type='BT' and back_sts='2'

select count(*) bs_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount,sum(ysy_amount) ysy_amount from ( select dbo.getdatestr1(back_date) back_date,back_code,dbo.getAgentName(a.agent_code) agent_name,ywy,back_demo,back_amount,a.agent_code,sfsf,dbo.getBTFHGZ(qt_amount) bttfgz,isnull((select SUM(bt_amount) from bt_list where bt_code=a.back_code),0) ysy_amount from backlist a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.agent_code and note_type='BT' and back_sts='2'
select bm,mc from bm_skfs where bm!='货款' order by pxh

row.CS: group by product_id) x,product_list y where x.Product_Id=y.ID order by back_amount @@sort,
row.SQL: select series_code,product_code,product_name+isnull(product_size,'') product_name,product_untl,product_image,Product_Id,fact_num,back_amount,reved_num from (select Product_Id,sum(a.fact_num) fact_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount,SUM(a.reved_num) reved_num from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and note_type='XS' and PRODUCT_NAME not like '折价%'

select dbo.getagentname(b.AGENT_CODE) agent_name,SUM(fact_num) fact_num,SUM(reved_num) reved_num,SUM(fact_amount) fact_amount from backdetails a,backlist b where a.BACK_CODE=b.BACK_CODE and Product_Id='@@product_id,' and sh_date between '@@sh_date1,' and '@@sh_date2,'
select lmbm lmid,LMMC,(select COUNT(*) from bm_lmcy where lmbm=a.lmbm) lm_num from bm_lm a where lmbm in (select lmbm from bm_lmcy where cybm='@@agent_code,')
select cyid,cybm,cymc,cy_headimage,lmmz,lmbm lmid From bm_lmcy where lmbm = '@@lmid,'
select a.agent_code,agent_name ,agent_headimage from WeiXinAppUser a,agent_list b where a.agent_code=b.AGENT_CODE and LXFS='@@lxfs,'
select bm,mc,bz from bm_ddlx where brand_name='@@brand_name,'

select 'SK@@yhdm,'+dbo.getDateStr2(getdate())+dbo.getDataSeq(isnull(max(right(back_code,3))+1,0)) back_code from backList where dbo.getDateStr1(back_date) = dbo.getDateStr1(getdate()) and note_type='SK'

row.CS: group by product_id) x,product_list y where x.Product_Id=y.ID
row.SQL: select COUNT(*) num,SUM(fact_num) fact_num,SUM(reved_num) reved_num from (select Product_Id,sum(a.fact_num) fact_num,sum(a.back_amount) back_amount,SUM(a.reved_num) reved_num from backdetails a,backlist b where a.back_code=b.back_code and note_type='XS' and PRODUCT_NAME not like '折价%'

select a.product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_image,series_code,xl_code,pcs_dj,product_num*product_price product_amount,fact_num abs_num,type_sales from KC_KCDTB a,v_absproductlist b where a.product_id*=b.product_id and a.agent_code='@@agent_code,' and a.Agent_Code=b.agent_code and (fact_num!=0 or product_num!=0)
select oper_demo,dbo.getDateTime(oper_date) opr_date,(add_num-minus_num) oper_num,order_code,arr_name from kcdtb_account where agent_code='@@agent_code,' and product_code='@@product_id,'

row.LJH: select count(*) total_num,sum(amount) total_amount,sum(hk_amount) total_hkamount from (select agent_code,SUM(amount) amount,SUM(hk_amount) hk_amount from dbo.v_xshzb_account('@@bedate1, 00:00:00','@@bedate2, 23:59:59' ) group by agent_code) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code
row.SQL: select x.AGENT_CODE,AGENT_NAME,SJBM,AGENT_ADDRESS,AGENT_TEL,CONTACT_MAN,dbo.getDateStr1(join_date) join_date,dbo.getDateStr1(end_date) end_date,Agent_StarLevel,is330kh,DOMAIN_MAN,amount,hk_amount from (select agent_code,SUM(amount) amount,SUM(hk_amount) hk_amount from dbo.v_xshzb_account('@@bedate1, 00:00:00','@@bedate2, 23:59:59' ) group by agent_code) x,agent_list y where x.agent_code=y.agent_code

row.SQL: select AGENT_CODE,AGENT_NAME,SJBM,AGENT_ADDRESS,AGENT_TEL,CONTACT_MAN,dbo.getDateStr1(join_date) join_date,dbo.getDateStr1(end_date) end_date,Agent_StarLevel,is330kh,DOMAIN_MAN,isnull((select top 1 Image_Path from orderimage where OrderCode=a.agent_code and Image_Type='门脸图' order by image_ID desc),'') image_ml,isnull((select top 1 Image_Path from orderimage where OrderCode=a.agent_code and Image_Type='产品成列图' order by image_ID desc),'') image_cp,isnull((select top 1 Image_Path from orderimage where OrderCode=a.agent_code and Image_Type='侧面图' order by image_ID desc),'') image_cm,Agent_Area,qyzk,sign_man,sign_sfz,account_man,yymj,spk from agent_list a where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,'
row.KJSM: 经销商门店档案单个店铺

row.SQL: select distinct Agent_StarLevel,Agent_StarLevel from agent_list where Agent_StarLevel is not null

select ID,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) rq,ckbm,ckmc,zdr,shr,pzh,zsl,zje,bz,sh,isnull((select top 1 Product_Image+'|'+psid+''+spmc+''xhgg from rkd_mx_z x,kc_kcdtb y where x.spbm=y.product_id and y.Agent_Code=a.ckbm and x.id=a.id),'') product_info from rkd_zb_z a where ckbm='@@agent_code,'
select spbm,psid,spmc,xhgg,jldw,sl,dj,je,cd,bz,tplj,a.id,rk_id,phd_id From RKD_mx_z a where a.id='@@id,'

select product_id,PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_Untl,PRODUCT_PRICE,Product_Image,STS,PRODUCT_NUM,product_amount,cbjj,series_code,xl_code,pcs_dj,type_sales,id,agent_code from kc_kcdtb where Agent_Code='@@agent_code,'
select series_code,series_name,agent_code from Series_list_z where agent_code='@@agent_code,'
select bm,mc from xl_list_z where sjbm='@@sjbm,' and agent_code='@@agent_code,'
select yhh,yhxm from TJ_SYS_YH where YHZ='区域经理' and sts='0'

select a.id,dbo.getDateStr1(rq) ldrq,DWBM,DWMC,CKMC,ZSL,ZJE,ZY,dbo.getDatetime(bzsj) bzsj,(select top 1 product_image+'|'+psid+'|'+spmc+'|'+xhgg From phd_mx x,product_list y where x.spbm=y.id and x.id=a.id) product_info from phd_zb a where DWBM='@@adh_agentcode,' and isJD='已结单' and isreceve is null

select SPBM product_id,SPMC product_name,XHGG product_size,PSID product_code,JLDW product_untl,sl,dj,je,cd,Product_Image tplj,a.series_code,b.xl_code,b.pcs_dj from PHD_MX a,product_list b where a.spbm=b.id and a.ID='@@id,'

select dbo.getDateStr1(ckrq) ckrq,Arr_Man,arr_address,Arr_Tel,ORDER_CODE,dh_sts,(select top 1 product_image+'|'+product_code+'|'+product_name+'|'+product_size from OrderProduct where order_code=a.order_code) product_info from orderlist a where agent_code='@@agent_code,' and dh_sts='已送货' order by ID desc

select product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl, product_num,product_price,product_amount,product_image,order_code,product_mj,order_memo,ysl from OrderProduct where ORDER_CODE='@@order_code,'

select PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_COLOR,PRODUCT_Untl,type_sales PRODUCT_PRICE,agent_code,product_image,dbo.getOrderMaxImage_xgt(a.product_id,'产品宣传图') product_xc_image,dbo.getOrderMaxImageAndSize_xgt_kcc(a.product_id,agent_code) product_xcsize_image,product_memo,type_sales from kc_kcdtb a where ID='@@id,'

row.CS: order by isattent desc,zjlxsj desc,id desc
row.SQL: select Order_Code,dbo.getDateTime(zjlxsj) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,case order_sts when 0 then '('+ismeter+')' when '9' then '('+ismeter+')' else '' end ismeter,case order_sts when '9' then '未成交' when '0' then '已成交' when '1' then '测量中' when '2' then '待设计' when '3' then '待安装' when '5' then '已安装' end ordersts_memo,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where isRead='0' and OrderCode=a.order_code) track_num,opr_dw,(select top 1 wx_headimage from tj_sys_yh where lxfs=isnull(a.ywy_tel,a.opr_tel)) wx_headimage,isnull(ismeter,'') ismeter,opr_tel,mytrans_flag,AZ_DATE,case ORDER_STS when '9' then 25-datediff(dd,groom_date,getdate()) else 0 end day_hs,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount,cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,az_sjdate,tjcs,dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getJLAZDate(yqazsj,ORDER_STS,az_date) jl_day ,djje,dh_sts,fph,sex,isattent,'' arrive_sts,qh_sts from orderList a where agent_code in ('@@agent_code,') and ywy_tel!='' and order_sts!='9' and dh_sts='待送货'

select checkItem_Id,checkItem,checkNum,isPecent,checkMemo,addorminus from bm_ygkhxm where checkItem_id not in (select checkItem_Id from emp_checkItem where lxfs='@@lxfs,' and agent_code='@@agent_code,' )

select bm,mc from bm_fylb where agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')

select x.ywy_tel,isnull(x.xzkhs,0) xzkhs,isnull(y.xzkhs,0) j_xzkhs,isnull(x.jdkhs,0) jdkhs,isnull(y.jdkhs,0) j_jdkhs,isnull(x.cjkhs,0) cjkhs,isnull(y.cjkhs,0) j_cjkhs,isnull(x.jrhke,0) jrhke,isnull(y.jrhke,0) j_jrhke,isnull(x.qdhte,0) qdhte,isnull(y.qdhte,0) j_qdhte,isnull(x.lxwke,0) lxwke,isnull(y.lxwke,0) j_lxwke,isnull(x.rzbxs,0) rzbxs,isnull(y.rzbxs,0) j_rzbxs,isnull(x.rzcys,0) rzcys,isnull(y.rzcys,0) j_rzcys from (select ywy_tel,SUM(xzkhs) xzkhs,SUM(jdkhs) jdkhs,SUM(cjkhs) cjkhs,SUM(jrhke) jrhke,SUM(qdhte) qdhte,SUM(lxwke) lxwke,SUM(rzbxs) rzbxs,SUM(rzcys) rzcys from dbo.v_ygyjb('@@date1,','@@date2,') where ywy_tel='@@ywy_tel,' group by ywy_tel) x,emp_plan y where x.ywy_tel*=y.lxfs and y.rw_ny='@@rwny,'

select YHXM,YHJB,xzkhs,jdkhs,cjkhs,jrhke,qdhte,lxwke,rzbxs,rzcys,0 yggz from (select ywy_tel,SUM(xzkhs) xzkhs,SUM(jdkhs) jdkhs,SUM(cjkhs) cjkhs,SUM(jrhke) jrhke,SUM(qdhte) qdhte,SUM(lxwke) lxwke,SUM(rzbxs) rzbxs,SUM(rzcys) rzcys from dbo.v_ygyjb('@@date1,','@@date2,') where ywy_tel in ('@@qx_mob_sj,')group by ywy_tel) a,tj_sys_yh b where b.lxfs*=a.ywy_tel and b.LXFS in ('@@qx_mob_sj,')

select arr_man,sex,arr_tel,arr_address,'店铺外购客户资源' groom_memo,'' metails,'' images_path,opr_man,opr_dw,opr_token,dbo.getDateTime(groom_date) groom_date,opr_tel,order_code from OrderList where Order_Src='外购资源' and YWY_TEL='' and agent_code='@@agent_code,'

select opr_id fee_id,'工资修正' fee_type,yhxm fee_man,a.lxfs Fee_tel, addcheckamount Fee_amount,dbo.getdatestr1(opr_date) fee_date,salary_memo Fee_Memo,'' agent_code,salary_rq fee_ny,'已入账' fee_sts from Emp_Salary a,tj_sys_yh b where a.lxfs=b.lxfs and checkItem='工资修正' and a.lxfs in ('@@qxdj,')
select lxfs,agent_code,rw_ny,xzkhs,jdkhs,cjkhs,jrhke,qdhte,lxwke,rzbxs,rzcys from emp_plan where rw_ny='@@rw_ny,' and lxfs='@@lxfs,'
select sum(product_num) product_num,sum(product_num*product_price) product_amount,max(allot_num) abs_num from KC_KCDTB where agent_code='@@agent_code,'

select sum(product_num) product_num,sum(product_num*product_price) product_amount,sum(product_num*type_sales) sales_amount,case sum(product_num*type_sales) when 0 then 0 else sum(product_num*product_price)/sum(product_num*type_sales)*10 end discount,0 az_mj from orderproduct a where a.order_code='@@order_code,'
select OrderCode product_id,'@@url_path,'+Image_Path image_path from OrderImage where Image_Type='产品宣传图' and OrderCode='@@product_txm,'

select PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_COLOR,PRODUCT_Untl,PRODUCT_PRICE,agent_code,product_image,dbo.getOrderMaxImage_xgt(a.id,'产品宣传图') product_xc_image,dbo.getOrderMaxImageAndSize_xgt(a.id,'产品宣传图') product_xcsize_image,demo product_memo,type_sales from product_list a where ID='@@id,'

select col_id,Arr_Tel,Arr_Man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address_detail,dbo.getDateTime(col_date) col_date,Col_Memo,Col_Amount,ORDER_CODE,ywy from ordercol a,OrderList b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and col_STS='未入账' and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')

select col_id,Arr_Tel,Arr_Man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address_detail,dbo.getDateTime(a.end_date) col_date,Col_Memo,Col_Amount,ORDER_CODE,ywy,cash,weixin,alipay,s_card,trans,s_other from ordercol a,OrderList b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and col_STS='已入账' and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')

select fee_id,Fee_Type,Fee_Man,Fee_Tel,Fee_Amount,dbo.getDateStr1(fee_date) fee_date,Fee_Memo,a.agent_code,fee_sts,AGENT_NAME,dbo.getOrderImage(Fee_Code,'报销图') bx_image, dbo.getOrderMaxImage(Fee_Code,'报销图') bx_max_image from emp_fee a,agent_list b where a.agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') and fee_type not in ('奖','罚') and Fee_sts='已提交' and a.agent_code=b.agent_code

select Fee_Type,Fee_Man,Fee_Tel,Fee_Amount,dbo.getDateStr1(fee_date) fee_date,Fee_Memo,a.agent_code,fee_sts,AGENT_NAME,dbo.getOrderImage(Fee_Code,'报销图') bx_image, dbo.getOrderMaxImage(Fee_Code,'报销图') bx_max_image from emp_fee a,agent_list b where a.agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') and fee_type not in ('奖','罚') and Fee_sts='已入账' and a.agent_code=b.agent_code
select agent_code,agent_address,Sb_Time,Xb_Time,Lon,Lat,city from agent_list where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,'

select yhh,yhxm,dept,isnull(dzjc,'')+isnull(bz,'') dzjc,yhjb,dz,lxfs,bm,wx_headimage,wx_nick,stuff(lxfs,4,4,'****') y_sj,stuff(yhxm,2,1,'*') y_yhxm from tj_sys_yh where lxfs in ('@@qxdj,') and sts='0'

row.CS: order by zjlxsj desc,groom_date desc,isattent desc
row.SQL: select Order_Code,dbo.getDatestr3(isnull(zjlxsj,groom_Date)) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,case order_sts when 0 then '('+ismeter+')' when '9' then '('+ismeter+')' else '' end ismeter, '未成交' ordersts_memo, agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where isRead='0' and OrderCode=a.order_code) track_num,opr_dw,(select top 1 wx_headimage from tj_sys_yh where lxfs=isnull(a.ywy_tel,a.opr_tel)) wx_headimage,isnull(ismeter,'') ismeter,opr_tel,mytrans_flag,AZ_DATE,case ORDER_STS when '9' then ISNULL(max_hsts,5)-datediff(dd,zjlxsj,getdate()) else 0 end day_hs,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount,cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,az_sjdate,tjcs,dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date,isattent,sex,dh_sts,ywy_tel,case ORDER_STS when '9' then datediff(dd,getdate(),isnull(yjlxsj,dateadd(dd,3,zjlxsj))) else 0 end day_gj from orderList a ,agent_list b where a.ywy_tel in ('@@qxdj,') and a.AGENT_CODE=b.AGENT_CODE and ywy_tel!='' and order_sts='9'

row.SQL: select Order_Code,dbo.getDateTime(order_date) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,case order_sts when 0 then '('+ismeter+')' when '9' then '('+ismeter+')' else '' end ismeter,case order_sts when '9' then '未成交' when '5' then '已安装' else isnull(dh_sts,'') end ordersts_memo,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where isRead='0' and OrderCode=a.order_code) track_num,opr_dw,(select top 1 wx_headimage from tj_sys_yh where lxfs=isnull(a.ywy_tel,a.opr_tel)) wx_headimage,isnull(ismeter,'') ismeter,opr_tel,mytrans_flag,AZ_DATE,case ORDER_STS when '9' then 25-datediff(dd,groom_date,getdate()) else 0 end day_hs,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount,cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,az_sjdate,tjcs,dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getJLAZDate(yqazsj,ORDER_STS,az_date) jl_day ,djje,dh_sts,cust_name fph,sex,isattent from orderList a where a.ywy_tel in ('@@qxdj,') and ywy_tel!='' and order_sts!='9'
row.KJSM: 订单跟进列表(已成交订单)

row.SQL: select x.num wrzbs,isnull(x.total_amount,0) wrzje,y.num yrzbs,isnull(y.total_amount,0) yrzje from (select count(*) num,sum(Col_Amount) total_amount from ordercol a,OrderList b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and col_STS='未入账' and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')) x,(select count(*) num,sum(Col_Amount) total_amount from ordercol a,OrderList b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and col_STS='已入账' and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')) y

select x.num wrzbs,isnull(x.total_amount,0) wrzje,y.num yrzbs,isnull(y.total_amount,0) yrzje from(select count(*) num,sum(fee_Amount) total_amount from emp_fee where agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') and fee_type not in ('奖','罚') and Fee_sts='已提交') x,(select count(*) num,sum(fee_Amount) total_amount from emp_fee where agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') and fee_type not in ('奖','罚') and Fee_sts='已入账') y

row.CS: order by isattent desc,zjlxsj desc,id desc
row.SQL: select Order_Code,dbo.getDateTime(zjlxsj) order_date,Cust_Name,arr_Tel,ht_amount,order_src,ywy,order_sts,opr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,case order_sts when 0 then '('+ismeter+')' when '9' then '('+ismeter+')' else '' end ismeter,case order_sts when '9' then '未成交' when '0' then '已成交' when '1' then '测量中' when '2' then '待设计' when '3' then '待安装' when '5' then '已安装' end ordersts_memo,dbo.getAgentName(agent_code) agent_name,arr_man,yqazsj,order_memo,isnull(az_man,'') az_man,'' fk_amount1,(select COUNT(*) from OrderTrack where isRead='0' and OrderCode=a.order_code) track_num,opr_dw,(select top 1 wx_headimage from tj_sys_yh where lxfs=isnull(a.ywy_tel,a.opr_tel)) wx_headimage,isnull(ismeter,'') ismeter,opr_tel,mytrans_flag,AZ_DATE,case ORDER_STS when '9' then 25-datediff(dd,groom_date,getdate()) else 0 end day_hs,isnull(order_amount,0) order_amount,cl_man,cl_date,cl_sjdate,az_sjdate,tjcs,dbo.getdatetime(groom_date) groom_date,dbo.getJLAZDate(yqazsj,ORDER_STS,az_date) jl_day ,djje,dh_sts,fph,sex,isattent from orderList a where agent_code='@@agent_code,' and ywy_tel!='' and order_sts!='9' and dh_sts in('已送货','已安装')
row.KJSM: 订单跟进列表(已安装订单)

row.SQL: select fee_id,fee_type,fee_man,Fee_tel,Fee_amount,dbo.getdatestr1(Fee_date) fee_date,Fee_Memo,a.Agent_Code,datename(yyyy,fee_date)+datename(mm,fee_date) fee_ny,fee_sts,fee_code,AGENT_NAME,dbo.getOrderImage(Fee_Code,'报销图') bx_image, dbo.getOrderMaxImage(Fee_Code,'报销图') bx_max_image from emp_fee a,agent_list b where fee_tel='@@lxfs,' and fee_type not in ('奖','罚') and a.Agent_Code=b.agent_code

select id,product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_amount,product_image,order_code,product_mj,order_memo,ysl,type_sales,product_num*type_sales sales_amount,parts_sts,srv_id from orderparts where srv_id='@@srv_id,'

select id,product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_amount,product_image,order_code,product_mj,order_memo,ysl,type_sales,product_num*type_sales sales_amount,parts_sts,srv_id from orderparts where order_code='@@order_code,'

select track_date track_date1,dbo.getDateStr3(track_date) track_date,track_man+case track_memo when '报修' then '(报修)' when '完工' then '(完工)' else '' end track_man,track_tel,track_content,agree_num,dbo.getTrackImage(track_id) image_paths,dbo.getTrackMaxImage(track_id) max_imagepaths,wx_headimage,track_id from ordertrack a,tj_sys_yh b where a.track_tel*=b.lxfs and ordercode='@@ordercode,' and track_memo='回访'
select arr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,Image_Path,image_type from OrderImage a,OrderList b where a.ordercode=b.order_code and OrderCode='@@order_code,'
select Image_Path,image_type from OrderImage where ordercode='@@order_code,'
select dbo.getcwbt('@@back_code,','@@sb_amount,','@@djq_id,','@@pzh,','@@xs,','@@dq_num,') bt_amount
select arr_man,arr_tel,Arr_Address,AZ_DATE,order_amount from orderlist where dh_code='@@back_code,'
select Pic_Id,Pic_Code,full_path,SUBSTRING(full_path,0,len(full_path)-36)+'/small/'+RIGHT(Full_Path,36) min_path from bm_tp where agent_code='@@agent_code,'
select yhid,yhxm,xb,sr,share_type,design_company,ywy,ywy_tel,agent_code,gzjy,ywygx,scfg,scfwlx,dgszcd,sflggs,bknl,card_no from WeiXinAppUser where YHID='@@yhid,'

select Bound_Id,Order_Code,bound,dbo.getdatetime(bound_Date) bound_date,Bound_Type,Bound_Memo,Opr_Tel,Opr_Man,Rev_Tel,Rev_Man,bound_sts,'来自'+dbo.getAgentName(agent_code)+' '+opr_man +'的红包' memo from OrderBound where Rev_Tel='@@lxfs,'

select Bound_Id,Opr_Man,Opr_Tel,bound,dbo.getDatetime(bound_date) bound_date,Bound_Type,'感谢'+Rev_Man+'推荐客户 '+ISNULL(bound_memo,'') bound_memo,bound_sts,agent_code from OrderBound where bound_sts='未入账' and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')

select Bound_Id,Opr_Man,Opr_Tel,bound,dbo.getDatetime(bound_date) bound_date,Bound_Type,'感谢'+Rev_Man+'推荐客户 '+ISNULL(bound_memo,'') bound_memo,bound_sts,agent_code from OrderBound where bound_sts='已入账' and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')

select x.num wrzbs,isnull(x.total_amount,0) wrzje,y.num yrzbs,isnull(y.total_amount,0) yrzje from (select count(*) num,sum(bound) total_amount from orderbound where bound_STS='未入账' and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')) x,(select count(*) num,sum(bound) total_amount from orderbound where bound_STS='已入账' and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')) y

select product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_image,sum(product_num-isnull(ysl,0)) qhs from OrderProduct a,orderlist b where a.order_code=b.order_code and (product_num-ysl)>0 and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') group by product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_image

select a.order_code,agent_code,cust_name,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,sum(product_num-isnull(ysl,0)) qhs from OrderList a,OrderProduct b where a.ORDER_CODE=b.order_code and (product_num-ysl)>0 and agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,')

select id item_id,product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_image,product_num-isnull(ysl,0) qhs,0 kcsl,order_code from OrderProduct where (product_num-ysl)>0 and order_code='@@order_code,'
select SPBM,SPMC,XHGG,PSID,JLDW,tplj,SL,DJ,JE,CK_ID,ref_id order_code from CKD_MX where ID='@@lxfs,'
select product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_num,kcsl,product_image,dhs,memo from dbo.v_yjhhz('@@agent_code,') where 1=1

select BACK_CODE,dbo.getDateStr1(back_date) back_date,BACK_NUM,Back_Amount,BACK_STS,isnull((select top 1 isnull(product_code,'')+isnull(product_name,'')+isnull(product_size,'')+'|'+isnull(product_image,'') prdouct_info from BackDetails where BACK_CODE=a.back_code),'') productinfo from backlist a where AGENT_CODE='@@agent_code,'
select id item_id,product_code,back_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_id,product_price,back_amount,back_num,product_image from BackDetails where BACK_CODE='@@back_code,'

select product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_image,series_code,xl_code,pcs_dj,product_num*product_price product_amount, abs_num,type_sales, lower_num,dhs from (select a.product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_image,series_code,xl_code,pcs_dj,product_num*product_price product_amount,isnull(fact_num,0) abs_num,type_sales,isnull(lower_num,0) lower_num,(product_num-isnull(fact_num,0)-isnull(lower_num,0)) dhs,a.agent_code from KC_KCDTB a,v_absproductlist b where a.product_id*=b.product_id and a.agent_code in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') ) x where dhs < 0

select ORDER_CODE,cust_name,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,arr_address,YWY,AZ_DATE,order_amount,col_amount,(order_amount-col_amount) qk_amount from (select ORDER_CODE,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,ywy,az_date,max(Order_Amount) order_amount,isnull(sum(Col_Amount),0) col_amount from OrderList a,ordercol b where a.ORDER_CODE=b.OrderCode and (ORDER_STS='5' or dh_sts='已安装') and fph!='历史订单' and order_amount>0 and AGENT_CODE in ('@@qx_mob_dp,') and datediff(dy,az_date,GETDATE())>60 group by ORDER_CODE,az_date,cust_name,arr_man,arr_tel,arr_address+arr_address_detail,ywy ) x where (order_amount-col_amount)>0

select LXFS,YHXM,card_no,share_type,design_company from (select top 6 LXFS,YHXM,card_no,share_type,design_company from WeiXinAppUser where ywy_tel in ('@@qxdj,') union all select '' LXFS,'无带单人' YHXM,'' card_no,'' share_type,'' design_company ) x where 1=1
select count(*) isSalarySet from Emp_CheckItem where lxfs='@@lxfs,'

row.SQL: select x.store_no,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,sl,x.bz,x.series_code,'' short_back_code,Product_Image,jsr Arr_Man,jsrdh Arr_Tel,shdz Arr_Address,y.pack_num zxgg,isjd, z.bz zxbz, dwbm from (select id,a.store_no,SPMC,case cd when '' then xhgg else isnull(xhgg,'')+'长度MM:'+cd end XHGG,PSID,JLDW,dbo.clearZero(ySL) sl,bz,a.series_code series_code,'' back_code,SPBM from PHD_MX_hz a where a.ID='@@id,' and a.store_no='@@LS.GXCK,' ) x,product_list y,phd_zb z where x.SPBM=y.id and x.id=z.id order by x.series_code

select ID,JBRMC,RQ,zy,bz,(select top 1 psid+''+spmc+XHGG+case isnull(cd,'') when '' then '' else '长度:'+cd+'mm' end spinfo from ZXD_mx where phd_id=a.id_phd and ID=a.id) spinfo,(select top 1 Product_Image from ZXD_MX m,product_list n where m.spbm=n.id and phd_id=a.id_phd and m.ID=a.id) Product_Image ,(select convert(varchar,convert(int,sum(SL)))+max(jldw) from ZXD_mx where phd_id=a.id_phd and ID=a.id) sl from zxd_zb a where ID_PHD='@@phd_id,' and bz='整箱'

select SPBM,psid+' '+SPMC+' '+xhgg+' '+isnull(sccj,'')+case cd when '' then '' else '长度：'+cd+' mm' end spinf,SL,zx_id,product_image,jldw,pack_num zxgg,sccj from zxd_mx a,product_list b where a.spbm=b.id and a.ID='@@id,' and phd_id='@@phd_id,'

select spbm,spinf,SUM(sl) sl,ph_id,product_image,jldw,zxgg from ( select SPBM,spinf,(ysl-zxs) SL,ph_id,product_image,y.product_untl jldw,pack_num zxgg from ( select a.ph_id,a.SPBM,a.psid+' '+a.SPMC+' '+a.xhgg+' '+case a.cd when '' then '' else '长度：'+a.cd+' mm' end spinf,max(ysl) ysl,isnull(SUM(b.sl),0) zxs from PHD_MX_HZ a,ZXD_MX b where a.ph_id*=b.ph_id and a.ID='@@phd_id,' and b.PHD_ID='@@phd_id,' group by a.ph_id,a.SPBM,a.psid+' '+a.SPMC+' '+a.xhgg+' '+case a.cd when '' then '' else '长度：'+a.cd+' mm' end ) x,product_list y where x.spbm=y.id and ysl!=zxs
select ID,JBRMC,RQ,zy,bz from zxd_zb where ID_PHD='@@phd_id,' and bz='零散'
select COUNT(*) iszx from ZXD_ZB where id_phd='@@phd_id,'

select ph_id,spbm,spmc,xhgg,psid,jldw,ysl sl,bz,product_Image,isnull((select SUM(sl) from ZXD_MX where PHD_ID=a.id and ph_id=a.ph_id),0) ysl,zxgg from phd_mx_hz a,product_list b where a.spbm=b.id and a.id='@@phd_id,'
select Pack_Name,Pack_TJ From Pack_List order by pxh
select ID from (select ID,isnull((select SUM(sl) from ZXD_MX where ID=a.id and PHD_ID=a.id_phd),0) sl from zxd_zb a where ID_PHD='@@phd_id,') x where sl=0
select BM,mc from bm_cw
select CKMC,DWBM from PHD_ZB where ID='@@s_phd_id,'
select zy,COUNT(*) sl from ZXD_ZB where ID_PHD='@@phd_id,' group by zy

select spbm,spinf,SUM(sl) sl,ph_id,product_image,jldw,zxgg,product_image from ( select SPBM,spinf,(ysl-zxs) SL,ph_id,product_image,y.product_untl jldw,pack_num zxgg from (select ph_id,SPBM,psid+' '+SPMC+' '+xhgg+' '+case cd when '' then '' else '长度：'+cd+' mm' end spinf,ysl,isnull((select SUM(sl) from ZXD_MX where ph_id=a.ph_id),0) zxs from PHD_MX_hz a where ID='@@s_phd_id,') x,product_list y where x.spbm=y.id ) m group by spbm,spinf,ph_id,product_image,jldw,zxgg
select id,dwmc from PHD_ZB where ID like '%@@id,%'
select count(*) isExist from orderlist where arr_tel='@@arr_tel,'
row.KJSM: 判断是否在客串串存在客户信息

row.SQL: select arr_tel,arr_man,arr_address+arr_address_detail arr_address,order_code from orderlist where agent_code='@@agent_code,'
row.KJSM: 获取客串串的未设计的订单信息
